title: The Future of Peacekeeping in Digital Frontiers

featured_article.title: Digital Mediation: A New Framework for Conflict Resolution
featured_article.author: Dr. A. O. Adeoye
featured_article.abstract: This paper explores the efficacy of asynchronous digital communication tools in de-escalating high-tension inter-communal disputes. By analyzing data from three pilot programs in West Africa, we propose a new 'Digital Buffer' framework...
